title._content: [Unidentified young soldier in Union uniform with Bowie knife] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified young soldier in Union uniform with Bowie knife] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.6 x 8.3 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: (front) Berg, no. 3-107; (back) Berg, no. 1-55. Additional information in collections file. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Subjects: United States.--Army--People--1860-1870.
